attributes.action: MPs have rejected all Brexit motions, it is now time to hold a General Election
attributes.background: Tonight eight proposals were voted on after MPs took control of proceedings at Westminster. As no single option has received a majority in the Commons, including a People’s Vote or the government’s negotiated deal, it is now time for a snap General Election to find a way forward.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's very similar to petitions we already have open. 
 
You might like to sign and share one or more of these petitions. 

Have another general election  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071

If Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister a general election must be held.  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252449
